page.title: 06Employment in Fremington
page.content: Employment one hundred families. 70% of people sent replies to our questions.From this we found out that 9 people work in the village, 52 people work in a local town and 9 in other places.Of these, 3 people work on the land,14 work in a factory, 18 do public service,5 work in the building industry and 32 have other jobs.Not very many people would like to change their jobs, we found only 4 who would.42 families had more than one adult in work at this time. Those who answered all our questions with a no,we counted as unemployed; this amounted to only 3.Most,67% of the families had someone in work. Of the 30% who did not reply we can't count them as unemployed because some people never reply or some get lost on the way home.
